docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court says it will decide whether a person with multiple domestic violence convictions in tribal court should be subject to harsher punishments for habitual offenders....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court says it will decide whether a person with multiple domestic violence convictions in tribal court should be subject to harsher punishments for habitual offenders.

headline.main: US Supreme Court to Decide Whether Tribal Convictions Count

docs.snippet: While big-city jails get most of the attention, lockups in small and medium-sized counties have actually driven the overall explosion in the U.S. inmate population, according to a new analysis of 45 years of jail statistics....
docs.lead_paragraph: While big-city jails get most of the attention, lockups in small and medium-sized counties have actually driven the overall explosion in the U.S. inmate population, according to a new analysis of 45 years of jail statistics.

headline.main: Study: Smaller Counties Driving US Jail Population Growth
headline.print_headline: Study: Smaller Counties Driving US Jail Population Growth

docs.snippet: Investigative documents, video and other materials released Tuesday in the shooting death of a 19-year-old black man by a Memphis police officer offer little conclusive evidence in a case that has prompted protests and calls for the officer to be ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Investigative documents, video and other materials released Tuesday in the shooting death of a 19-year-old black man by a Memphis police officer offer little conclusive evidence in a case that has prompted protests and calls for the officer to be fired.

headline.main: Witnesses: Memphis Officer Shot Man as He Tried to Run Away
headline.print_headline: Witnesses: Memphis Officer Shot Man as He Tried to Run Away

docs.lead_paragraph: Twenty-four paintings worth a total of more than $1.4 million disappeared 10 years ago. Today, an ultranationalist militia says it has them.

headline.main: Stolen Dutch Art Shows Up in Ukraine, but Getting It Back Isn’t Easy
